message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. How about a price of $11,000?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to consider that price?
Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product to you is significant.  I could come down to $10,500, which is a very fair offer.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $9,800?
